mapper.insert: insert into portpolio.board(title, writer, content) values(#{board.title}, #{board.writer}, #{board.content})
mapper.select: select * from portpolio.board where isDel='N' order by num desc limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
mapper.update: update portpolio.board set title=#{board.title}, content=#{board.content}, isDel=#{board.isDel} where num=#{board.num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from portpolio.board where isDel = 'N'
mapper.update: update portpolio.board set views = views+1 where num = #{num} and isDel = 'N'
mapper.select: select * from portpolio.likes where boardNum = #{like.boardNum} and userId = #{like.userId}
